bibl.bibl: Hudson, William Henry. 1870. On the ornithology of Buenos Ayres. [Letters from W. H. Hudson to the Zoological Society of London read 10 and 24 February, 24 March, 26 May, 23 June, 1 and 15 November, and 6 December 1870] Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London (1870): 87–9, 112–14, 158–60, 332–4, 545–50, 671–3, 748–50, 798–802.
